update gw_cluster set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, namespace = #{namespace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_type = #{addressType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idc_id = #{idcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stauts = #{stauts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from gw_cluster where del_flag!=1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
and organization_code in
#{organizationCode}
